faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and processes

questions.question: How does the recruitment process work?
questions.answer: Our process is simple: First, we understand your needs or career goals. Then, we match you with suitable opportunities or candidates. We facilitate interviews and provide support throughout the process until a successful placement is made.

questions.question: What industries do you specialize in?
questions.answer: We work across multiple industries including Technology, Finance, Healthcare, Marketing, Sales, Engineering, Design, and Operations. Our team has expertise in various sectors to serve diverse client needs.

questions.question: How long does it typically take to find a candidate?
questions.answer: The timeline varies depending on the role and requirements, but typically we can present qualified candidates within 1-2 weeks. For specialized positions, it may take 2-4 weeks to find the perfect match.

questions.question: Do you charge candidates for your services?
questions.answer: No, our services are completely free for candidates. We are paid by our client companies when we successfully place a candidate. There are no fees or hidden costs for job seekers.

questions.question: What makes Recruta different from other agencies?
questions.answer: We take a personalized approach to every placement. We don't just match resumes—we understand the unique needs of both candidates and clients, ensuring long-term success and satisfaction. Our team provides ongoing support throughout the entire process.

questions.question: Can you help with remote positions?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We work with companies offering remote, hybrid, and on-site positions. We can help you find opportunities that match your preferred work arrangement.

questions.question: What should I prepare for my first meeting?
questions.answer: For candidates: Bring an updated resume, be ready to discuss your career goals, and think about what you're looking for in your next role. For clients: Be prepared to discuss your hiring needs, company culture, and the ideal candidate profile.

questions.question: Do you offer contract and permanent placements?
questions.answer: Yes, we work with both contract and permanent positions. Whether you're looking for a short-term project or a long-term career opportunity, we can help you find the right fit.

hero.title: About Recruta
hero.subtitle: We're a trusted recruitment agency dedicated to connecting exceptional talent with outstanding opportunities. Our mission is to make recruitment simple, personal, and effective for everyone.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2015, Recruta was born from a simple belief: recruitment should be about people, not just processes. We saw too many talented candidates overlooked and too many companies struggling to find the right fit.
story.paragraph2: Over the years, we've built a reputation for excellence by taking a personalized approach to every placement. We don't just match resumes to job descriptions—we understand the unique needs of both candidates and clients to create lasting, successful partnerships.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to have helped thousands of professionals find their dream jobs and hundreds of companies build their dream teams. Our commitment to integrity, excellence, and innovation continues to drive everything we do.
